+(common) {
+    encode zstd gzip
+    log {
+        output stdout

+}

+example.org {
+    import common
+    reverse_proxy example-org:80
+}
+
+example.net {
+    import common
+    redir https://example.org{uri}
+}

+    import common
+    redir https://example.org{uri}
+}

+    import common
